Class GraphicsScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • mh.GraphicsScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GraphicsScreen
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable

      • getKeyCode

        public int getKeyCode()
        Returns:
        the key code sampled when a waitForClick() state was enabled:
        • 32...127: key code
        • 232: left mouse button
        • 233: right mouse button

      • setTextSize

        public void setTextSize(int size)
        Parameters:
        size - - the size of an uppercase letter, e.g. 'A'
        • size = 1: 5x7 pixels
        • size = 2: 10x14 pixels
        • size = 3: 15x21 pixels
        • size = 4: 20x28 pixels
        • size = 5: 25x35 pixels
        • size = 6: 30x42 pixels
        • size = 7: 35x49 pixels
        • size = 8: 40x56 pixels

      • saveImage

        public boolean saveImage(java.lang.String fileName)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Save the current image to a file in PNG format. If the image is empty no file is written.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - the name of the file to write. Any extension is stripped and replaced by ".png"..
        Returns:
        - true is a file was written, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if something goes wrong.

      • waitForClick

        public void waitForClick()
        Enables sampling of a mouse click or key press. Use the wasClicked() method to find out whether a mouse or keyboard key was pressed.

      • wasClicked

        public boolean wasClicked()
        Returns:
        true if a mouse click or key press was registered.

      • mouseClicked

        public void mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Samples the mouse pointer coordinates when the graphics cursor is visible. Stores a virtual key code for mouse button. Sets a flag which can be read with the wasClicked() method.
        Specified by:
        mouseClicked in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener

      • checkMouseState

        private void checkMouseState(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Called when a mouse key is pressed. If the graphics cursor is visible the current cursor position and a character code 'M' are stored..
        Parameters:
        e -

      • keyTyped

        public void keyTyped(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Samples the current mouse pointer coordinates when the graphics cursor is visible. Stores the key charcter code and sets a flag which can be read with the wasClicked() method.
        Specified by:
        keyTyped in interface java.awt.event.KeyListener
